settings.text:
Please read the following terms and conditions. By purchasing from Amsterdam Modern you agree to the following terms:

1. By purchasing from Amsterdam Modern I agree to take full responsibility for transportation of purchased, memoed or rented item(s).

2. I acknowledge Amsterdam Modern may assist me or delivery drivers in packing and loading vehicles. I accept Amsterdam Modern is not responsible nor liable for any damages to the car or to the item(s) during transportation. 

3. I agree to pay for all shipping and delivery charges arranged by Amsterdam Modern and agreed to all parties involved.

4. Amsterdam Modern is not responsible for any damages caused during transportation by 3rd party shipping and delivery companies.

5. All inventory sold by Amsterdam Modern is vintage, used, in original condition or lightly refinished, and sold as is. All sales are final.

6. I acknowledge Amsterdam Modern is not liable or responsible for any inventory. 

7. Amsterdam Modern does not take any responsibility and is not liable for any damage caused through use of the item(s) I purchase, rent or take on memo. 

8. I agree to take full responsibility for any item(s) I purchase, rent or take on memo. 

9. If I have selected the ‘pick up’ option on an order, I agree to pick up or have a 3rd party pick up all purchased item(s) within one (1) week of purchase. If I fail to collect purchased item(s) within one (1) week of purchase, I agree to pay the 25% storage fee.

10. If I have requested Amsterdam Modern to assist in arranging shipping or delivery for an order, I agree to fully comply with agreed upon shipping or delivery instructions, including providing payment before the order is picked up by the 3rd party shipping or delivery company.

For more information about our terms of service, if you have questions, please contact us by e-mail at info@amsterdammodern.com or by mail using the details provided below:

134 Glendale Blvd, Los Angeles, CA, 90026, United States

All of our inventory is vintage. We sell the majority of pieces the way we found them, to keep true to their authenticity and charm; that means there may be scratches, dents, chips, patina, etc. and we like it that way ;) Please keep this in mind when buying from us as all sales are FINAL. Amsterdam Modern is not liable or responsible for any inventory– including damage caused through use of the pieces sold or pieces on display in the warehouse. Feel free to contact info@amsterdammodern.com about the condition of any items before purchasing.

Please keep in mind when shopping with Amsterdam Modern:

  • You break it, you buy it.
  • Children and pets MUST be supervised at all times! For their own safety.
  • DO NOT try to lift any furniture, for your own safety - ask for assistance. We are here to help you! 

If you would like to see a specific item(s), please plan your visit by https://calendly.com/amsterdammodern so we can make sure the item(s) you would like to view is easily accessible– when booking your appointment online, there is a notes field to specify item(s) you’d like to view. You may also reach our front desk at 213-221-7380 to schedule a visit. Walk-ins are always welcome, just ring the doorbell when you arrive. We look forward to seeing you!
